mapper.select: select model_category_id, sequence_number, code, name, remark, tree_level from w_model_category order by sequence_number

select model_id, m.sequence_number, m.code, category_id, c.code as category_code, unit_id from w_model as m join w_model_category as c on m.category_id = c.model_category_id where category_id = #{id} order by m.sequence_number

select model_id, m.sequence_number, m.code, category_id, c.code as category_code, unit_id from w_model as m join w_model_category as c on m.category_id = c.model_category_id
and m.code like #{name}||'%' and m.code like '%'||#{name}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into w_model(sequence_number, code, category_id, unit_id) values(#{sequenceNumber}, #{code}, #{categoryID}, #{unitID})
mapper.select: select model_id, m.sequence_number, m.code, category_id, c.code as category_code, unit_id, u.name as unit_name from w_model as m join w_model_category as c on m.category_id = c.model_category_id join w_measurement_unit as u on m.unit_id = u.measurement_unit_id order by c.sequence_number, m.sequence_number
